text: Cruas is a village and commune that can be found by the Rhône River in the Ardèche département of France. The commune has a population of 2,405 people as of the year 1999.http://www.insee.fr/fr/recensement/nouv_recens/resultats/repartition/comd07.htm?numdep=07&x;=39&y;=7 List of populations and communes of the Ardeche department ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ardèche department ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.cruas.com Category:Communes in Ardèche
title: Cruas
